description: 30 hand-crafted errors + 1 pre-existing transcription error: 11 easy, 10 medium, 10 hard

issues.description: P&L gross profit transposed: 1,191,591 -> 1,191,951. Turnover 11,413,312 minus COGS 10,221,721 should = 1,191,591.
P&L taxation transposed: (15,756) -> (15,576). PBT 70,027 minus tax should = profit from continuing ops 54,271. With (15,576), it would be 54,451.
BS current assets subtotal transposed: 2,859,843 -> 2,895,843. Sum of individual current asset items should = 2,859,843.
BS total equity transposed: 2,112,786 -> 2,112,876. Sum of equity components should = 2,112,786.
CF operating cash inflow transposed: 280,854 -> 280,584. 317,102 - 1,129 - 35,119 should = 280,854.
BS non-current liabilities subtotal transposed: 1,113,221 -> 1,131,221. Sum of NC liability items should = 1,113,221.
OCI total comprehensive income transposed: 52,573 -> 52,753. Net profit 54,271 minus total OCI 1,698 should = 52,573.
CF net inflow before financing transposed: 217,284 -> 217,824. Operating 280,854 plus investing (63,570) should = 217,284.
BS current liabilities subtotal transposed: 2,573,857 -> 2,573,587. Sum of individual CL items should = 2,573,857.
CF financing activities total transposed: 103,610 -> 103,160. Sum of financing line items should = 103,610.
Note 3 Services turnover: 9,999,701 -> 9,999,710. Services + Products - Elimination should = P&L turnover 11,413,312. With 9,999,710 the segment total would be 11,413,321.

Note 11 intangibles amortization total transposed: (41,503) -> (41,305). Component amortization sums to (41,503). Also breaks rollforward: 2,321,294 + 4,886 + 24,686 - 41,503 - 10,322 - 93 = 2,298,948.
Note 18 finished goods transposed: 151,174 -> 151,714. Finished goods + raw materials should = BS inventories 156,644.
Note 19 trade due from subtotal transposed: 539,933 -> 539,393. Associated (57) + Other (539,876) should = 539,933.
Note 21 ageing total: 1,017,189 -> 1,017,198. Ageing buckets sum to 1,017,189 which ties to BS trade receivable.
Note 23 payables ageing total transposed: 1,503,684 -> 1,503,648. Ageing buckets sum to 1,503,684 which ties to BS trade payables.
Note 28 LT liabilities total transposed: 1,593,391 -> 1,593,931. Sum of 5 LT liability items should = 1,593,391.
Note 31 operating profit before WC changes transposed: 417,535 -> 417,353. Sum of PBT plus 14 adjustment items should = 417,535.
Note 12 PPE closing NBV transposed: 195,876 -> 195,867. Rollforward: 201,973 - 608 + 48,072 - 3,094 - 50,467 = 195,876. Also should tie to BS PPE.
Note 3 geographic turnover total: 11,413,312 -> 11,413,321. Sum of 4 regions should = P&L turnover 11,413,312.
Note 11 accumulated amort for customer relationships transposed: (122,202) -> (122,022). Breaks the column check: cost 195,394 minus accum amort (122,202) should = NBV 73,192.
Note 29 DBO actuarial gains from experience transposed: (2,421) -> (2,412). Breaks DBO rollforward: opening 34,336 + movements should = 33,213.
Note 30 DTA provisions P&L charge transposed: 1,605 -> 1,650. Breaks column check: 5,623 + 1,605 + 308 should = 7,536. Also breaks row total: component charges should sum to 7,237.
Note 21 receivables RMB currency amount transposed: 95,042 -> 95,024. Sum of 8 currencies should = current portion 1,157,971.
issues.location: Note 21 Trade and Other Receivables (currency breakdown)

issues.description: Note 28 LT liabilities RMB amount transposed: 77,642 -> 77,624. Sum of 11 currencies should = total LT liabilities 1,593,391.
Note 25 new shares issued transposed: 32,341 -> 32,431 ('000). Breaks: 8,506,586 + 32,341 should = 8,538,927. Also breaks parallel HK$ column: 106,332 + 404 = 106,736.
Note 41 company BS due from subsidiaries transposed: 4,261,640 -> 4,261,460. Breaks current assets total (should be 4,262,545) and ultimately the company balance sheet balance.
issues.location: Note 41 Balance Sheet of the Company

issues.description: Note 29 plan assets government debt transposed: 6,677 -> 6,767. Sum of 11 asset categories should = total plan assets 25,260.
Note 12 PPE furniture depreciation transposed: (19,159) -> (19,195). Component depreciation should sum to total (50,467). Also breaks column rollforward for furniture category.
issues.location: Note 12 Property, Plant and Equipment (detail column)

issues.description: Note 3 SCS core operating profit transposed: 90,993 -> 90,939. SCS (90,993) + Logistics (93,660) should = Services COP 184,653. Also breaks tie to segment total in main table.
BS current liabilities 'Due from related companies' should be 'Due to related companies'. The original PDF correctly says 'Due to' but the transcription incorrectly wrote 'Due from'.
